xwikidoc.title: Copper Dragon Xartialimax
xwikidoc.content: A Copper Dragon which lives in a cave in the vicinity of High Hold. Xartialimax is a rival of Baranax. Generally this dragon keeps to himself or associates with the Eldar and some elves.
